name: Fireboy and Watergirl: Duel - Addicting Multiplayer Shooting Game
name_original: Fireboy and Watergirl: Duel - Addicting Multiplayer Shooting Game
description:
Legendary PC game Fireboy and Watergirl is now on App Store as a different version!

Can you operate two characters at once? (you can play with your friends or online multiplayer version!)

Help them survive as long as possible but don't forget that bullets become faster over time!
